channel.title: Daily Express :: World Feed
channel.description: Simply The Best 7 Days A Week

item.title: Donald Trump LIVE: President backs down on Iran attack and issues statement
item.description: The US president has reportedly given the green light to plans to attack Iran, but withheld the final order.
item.author: Rebecca Robinson,William Morgan
item.media:keywords: Donald Trump, Iran-Israel conflict, Israel-Iran conflict, US involvement, Iran's nuclear programme

media:content.media:description: The US president has reportedly approved plans to strike Iran.

media:thumbnail.media:description: The US president has reportedly approved plans to strike Iran.

item.title: Babies were in Israel hospital 'targeted' by 'disgusting and horrendous' Iran
item.description: Babies were amongst the patients in the hospital which Israel alleges was deliberately attacked.
item.author: Conor Wilson
item.media:keywords: Israel, Iran, Iran-Israel conflict, Benjamin Netenyahu, Isaac Herzog, War, hospital, war crime, Gaza, nuclear weapons, Donald Trump

item.title: Gibraltar row erupts as Spain minister vows to 'never renounce' UK territory despite deal
item.description: The Spanish government has called upon the UK at the United Nations to address the decolonisaltion of Gibraltar.
item.author: Emily Wright,Maria Ortega
item.media:keywords: Gibraltar, Spain, International Relations, United Nations, Spain-UK relations, Decolonisation, Sovereignty dispute, Hector Gomez, Spanish Government, United Nations headquarters, the Rock, colonial status, Jose Manuel Albares, Angel Pelayo Gordillo

media:content.media:description: The Spanish Government has called on the UK to address the decolonisation of Gibraltar.

media:thumbnail.media:description: The Spanish Government has called on the UK to address the decolonisation of Gibraltar.

item.title: Heartbreaking last video of mum who died after getting rabies on Morocco holiday
item.description: A tragic last video captured joyful moments of a Barnsley mum before her sudden death from rabies.
item.author: Aditi Rane

media:content.media:description: Mum who died of rabies after petting stray dog on holiday

media:thumbnail.media:description: Mum who died of rabies after petting stray dog on holiday

item.title: Desperate Iran ‘may activate sleeper agents in the UK’ in last gasp attempt to beat Israel
item.description: Israel's Supreme Leader may be attempting to activate terrorist "sleeper cells" across the West, Middle East experts have said.
item.author: Emily Wright
item.media:keywords: Iran-Israel conflict, Iran, Terror, Israel, Middle East, Hamas, Hezbollah, Iran sleeper cells, Ali Khamenei, IRGC, Middle East conflict, Barak Seener, inflammatory statements, Donald Trump, runs out of traditional resources, increasingly dangerous

media:content.media:description: Israel's Supreme Leader may be attempting to activate terrorist 'sleeper cells' in the West.

media:thumbnail.media:description: Israel's Supreme Leader may be attempting to activate terrorist 'sleeper cells' in the West.

item.title: Ryanair flight from UK to Greece crashes on runway with wing completely wrecked
item.description: A Ryanair flight crashed into a barrier, completely wrecking one of its wings, at a Greek airport.
item.author: Emily Wright
item.media:keywords: Ryanair, Flights, Plane, Greece, Stansted Airport, Boeing 737, Kalamata International Airport, severe turbulence, seatbelt sign, aircraft landed, barrier, collided, smashed wing, Greek airport, terrified passengers, FR6080, extensive damage

media:content.media:description: A Ryanair flight crashed into a barrier, completely wrecking one of its wings, in Greece.

media:thumbnail.media:description: A Ryanair flight crashed into a barrier, completely wrecking one of its wings, in Greece.

item.title: Russian army meltdown as soldiers shoot their own commander and troops surrender en masse
item.description: WARNING - DISTRESSING CONTENT: The senseless slaughter on the frontlines has driven some Russian soldiers to take extreme action against their brutal senior officers.
item.author: John Varga
item.media:keywords: Russia, Ukraine, Russia army, Russia army desertions, Vladimir Putin, Lyman, Kharkiv, Volodymyr Zelensky, Kyiv, Kremlin

media:content.media:description: A Russian BM-21 «Grad» MLRS explodes into flames after a direct hit

media:thumbnail.media:description: A Russian BM-21 «Grad» MLRS explodes into flames after a direct hit

item.title: EU civil war explodes as Ursula von der Leyen sidelines MEPs with £128bn plan
item.description: Ursula von der Leyen said she bypassed MEPs to address "existential" challenges in Europe.
item.author: Eleanor Burleigh
item.media:keywords: Ursula von der Leyen, European Union

media:content.media:description: The EU boss insisted that the defence loan scheme is 'fully justified'

media:thumbnail.media:description: The EU boss insisted that the defence loan scheme is 'fully justified'

item.title: POLL: Do the anti-tourism protests put you off going to Spain on holiday?
item.description: Spanish activists are becoming increasingly frustrated over the lack of political action to address overtourism and are planning another summer of full-on protests.
item.author: John Varga
item.media:keywords: Spain, Overtourism, Spain tourism protests, Barcelona, Majorca, Holidays, Travel

media:content.media:description: Anti-tourism protesters in Barcelona take water guns with them

media:thumbnail.media:description: Anti-tourism protesters in Barcelona take water guns with them

item.title: San Pedro del Pinatar horror as Spain bar explosion sees at least 13 people injured
item.description: Emergency crews are currently at the scene after the incident in the Spanish town.
item.author: Mieka Smiles,Eleanor Burleigh

media:content.media:description: There has been an explosion in a Spanish bar in a small seaside town
